sys_script.name: Create Account

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_ca5db02b87c88590baf50fa90cbb3582
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_hconnector_account</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_hconnector_account">state=submitted^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Account</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    (function() {

        try {
            var inputs = {};
            inputs['key'] = current.public_key; // String 
            inputs['memo'] = current.memo; // String 
            var result = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().action('x_snc_hconnector.createaccount').inForeground().withInputs(inputs).run();
            var outputs = result.getOutputs();
			
            var out = outputs['out']; // String
            gs.addInfoMessage(out)
            var outobj = JSON.parse(out)

            current.account = outobj.receipt.accountId
            current.state = 'processed'


        } catch (ex) {
            var message = ex.getMessage();
            gs.error(message);
        }

    })();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-01 21:18:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ca5db02b87c88590baf50fa90cbb3582</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Account</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="hconnector" source="x_snc_hconnector">0e01e57e874c8190baf50fa90cbb354e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="hconnector">0e01e57e874c8190baf50fa90cbb354e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ca5db02b87c88590baf50fa90cbb3582</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-09 09:00:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ca5db02b87c88590baf50fa90cbb3582"/></record_update>
